response.overview: A story about a family in which a disabled child has appeared, requiring constant care. His disability crossed out many of his parents' plans and dreams. In the film we can see how his father is coping with the situation. He makes reflections, searches for the sense of difficult experiences, and with love performs daily activities with his son. "By constantly looking into one's own inner self, it is possible to live together in difficult situations, to leave one another, to apologize, to forgive," he says.
response.title: Czas trwania
